cluster_type.description: type of cluster to execute on

client_id.description: a unique ID of spydra client

collector_timeout_minutes.description: timeout after which a cluster is being deleted if no heartbeats were received

history_timeout.description: time in seconds to wait for job history to be moved

log_bucket.description: bucket for storage of Hadoop logs and history information

region.description: The region in which the cluster should be created. Replaces the zone option in cluster.

job_type.description: type of job to execute (e.g. hadoop/spark/etc), see `gcloud dataproc jobs submit --help`

default_zones.description: Zones to be chosen from randomly if not specified

options.description: gcloud options for cluster creation, see `gcloud dataproc clusters create --help`
gcloud options for job submission, see `gcloud dataproc jobs submit --help`

max.description: maximum number of nodes to use for autoscaling

factor.description: percentage of containers that should be running from 0.0 to 1.0

downscale.description: whether or not to enable downscaling

downscale_timeout.description: how long to wait in minutes for active jobs to finish before terminating nodes

pooling.description: options for the EXPERIMENTAL pooling of cluster

max_age.description: A java.time.Duration for the maximum age of a cluster

dry_run.description: do not execute anything, just print out commands that would be run

metric_class.description: Implementation to use for metrics reporting
